name: Asador Mayhem
description:
AsadoMayhem is a VR vs non VR Online Multiplayer Game.

Platform: Windows

Host must be VR (we tested only in Oculus) and the other players are Non VR.

Host plays as BBQ Pit Master, and have to keep the crowd happy while they wait for the main dish (The Ham Leg).
If the Ham Leg is finished, Pit Master Wins.

Other players take role of Racoons that must disturb the PitMaster and make crowd leave before main dish is ready.
Raccoons move with WASD + Mouse and use Left Mouse Click to Pick Up and Throw food.
